title: The Commissioner, before issuing DRC, shall verify and satisfy himself that the ownership and title of the land proposed for surrender is with the applicant, and get the Property Registered Card (PRC) to be corrected in the name of Planning Authority
clause_text: The Commissioner, before issuing DRC, shall verify and satisfy himself that the ownership and title of the land proposed for surrender is with the applicant, and get the Property Registered Card (PRC) to be corrected in the name of Planning Authority.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The Commissioner, before issuing DRC, shall verify and satisfy himself that the ownership and title of the land proposed for surrender is with the applicant, and get the Property Registered Card (PRC)
